chess.model

Class AbstractPiece

  • java.lang.Object
    • chess.model.AbstractPiece
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPiece
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Bishop, King, Knight, Pawn, Queen, Rook

    public abstract class AbstractPiece
extends java.lang.Object
implements IPiece
    Abstract piece class with abstract parameters for all inherit piece class
    Author:
    Xiang

    • Method Detail

      • sideMove

        public boolean sideMove(int x,
               int y,
               boolean pieceFound,
               AbstractPiece targetPiece)
        method that indicates if an piece who can side move can successfully move by side range.
        Parameters:
        x - - target row
        y - - target column
        pieceFound - - is there a target piece found
        targetPiece - - target piece instance
        Returns:
        true if successfully moved, false if not successful

        protected boolean pieceSideCoor(int[] tempCoor,
                    int moveCase)
        update side target able coorPosition by piece
        Parameters:

        moveCase - - target orientation case
        Returns:
        true if can target, else can't target because its outside target range
